How we work

4 steps from call to order

01

Make an application

Please tell us the make of the vehicle and the problem to be solved

02

A handyman is coming

will run an on-site diagnostic.
Negotiates a price for the repair

03

Solves your problem

Car repairman will carry out repairs, replace parts if necessary.

04

Payment after repair

After the work is done, make
payment in a way that is convenient for you
